landing.headline: Connecting Fields to Markets, Seamlessly.
landing.tagline: FarmLink is the all-in-one platform empowering farmers, retailers, and local markets with AI-driven insights for a more efficient and fair agricultural ecosystem.

farmer.title: Farmer Portal
farmer.description: Manage your produce, track earnings, and connect with markets.
farmer.hero: Join our network of local farmers, manage your produce, and reach more buyers.

retailer.title: Retailer Portal
retailer.description: Browse produce, place orders, and discover new local suppliers.
retailer.hero: Discover the freshest local produce, connect with farmers, and place orders with ease.

market.title: Market Portal
market.description: Oversee market operations, participation, and logistics.
market.hero: Manage operations, track farmer participation, and streamline logistics.

admin.title: Admin Portal
admin.description: System administration, user management, and analytics.
admin.hero: Oversee the entire platform, manage users, and ensure everything runs smoothly.

register.farmerDescription: Create an account to manage your produce and earnings.
register.farmerHero: Join our network of local farmers, manage your produce, and reach more buyers.
register.retailerDescription: Create an account to browse produce and place orders.
register.retailerHero: Discover the freshest local produce, connect with farmers, and place orders with ease.
register.marketDescription: Create an account to oversee market operations and logistics.
register.marketHero: Manage operations, track farmer participation, and streamline logistics.
register.adminDescription: Create an account to manage the FarmLink platform.
register.adminHero: Create an account to oversee the entire platform, manage users, and ensure everything runs smoothly.
